content: hi everyone i wanna share with you this cute bear with a scarf and a little leaf i named him cafe because i feel like he gives off nice cup of coffee vibes anyways the pattern uses only basic stitches so it is suitable for beginners and it also works up fairly quick materials for this project yarn in colors brown orange green or teal for scarf a little bit of pink black embroidery thread safety eyes stuffing tapestry needle available in english here http //hisheepok blogspot com/2024/11/autumn-bear html on youtube https //youtu be/iibtvygeses disponible en español aqui https //hisheepokes blogspot com/2024/11/oso-otonal html
